short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remind yourself of who Convicted Felon Donald Trump Truly is

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A shocking number of people don’t even know Convicted Felon Donald Trump was recently found guilty of 34 felony counts by a jury of his peers . Some are reporting polling that suggest more than half of swing voters don’t know about the felony conviction. That is nuts. We need to be saying it all the time. So, let’s normalize the phrase. Remind ourselves to do so & reminder others to do so as well. Let’s make it easy on ourselves - anytime we see Convicted Felon Donald Trump's name it will remind us that he is, in fact, a convicted felon.
